name: HanExoftTV
short_description:
HanExoft TV 2014.10.1
1. To users: Simply click the station button, your local default web browser
    opens the page containing the TV programms or videos.  So the TV soft-
    ware actually provides you with shortcuts to TV pages. Click ">>" to hide
     the window to the right side and restore when you move mouse in. If you 
     want to shut down coumputer automatically after watching TV, simply se-
     lect the minutes or input your own time. 
2. To owners of linked pages: This is only a shortcut to your page, nothing is
     changed and you have all the right. If you still don't like to be linked, send
     an email to yunyuhan@gmail.com, the link will be removed in new version.
3. Notes: This is a non-commercial, non-profital programm, but made for 
    helping people. It is 100% free of use and distribution. No commercial!
                                        Compiler: Yunyu Joseph Han     October 8，2014
summary: It opens online TV and videos for you by a click.
